name: Flower Hero (ExpendibleMan)
description:
This is our entry for the Ludum Dare 41 global game jam.

The theme was two incompatible genres. We’ve combined the practiced perfection of rhythm games and sullied it with the random number generation hell of card games.

Use the hand you were dealt to deal with the flowers(notes) coming down the path towards you.

Green cards are wild and will deal with any colour flower.

Don’t let flowers past the red zone, even if you have to use the wrong kind of card.

Match cards to flowers to increase your score multiplier, miss one or use the wrong card and the combo goes back to 0.
